--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> I've updated the Charlist on the website, so it's kinda empty now. 
> People can start creating their characters, and I'll put the Bio's 
> on there are they come in. 
> 
> I'm updating the story at the moment.

Well here are mine although there all from the series

Inferno:
Gender: Male 
Alliegence Predacon 
Alternate Mode(s): Robot/Ant

Description:

"For the glory of the colony!" 

(How many points do I get to assign for each stat? I saw where there 
was stats for Megatron's bio but no one elses)

Weapons: 
1) Flamethrower\Rocket Launcher\Energy Blaster combo weapon (At least 
it did all of that in the show) (Robot Mode)
2) 2 Hand held energy blaters (Robot Mode)

Beast Mode: 
Inferno's beast mode is a rather large red fire ant.

History: 
Mindlessly loyal to Megatron who he thinks is his queen Inferno seeks 
only to searve Megatron. This is all because of a mistake that 
occured during the aquiring of a beast mode.

______________________________________________________________________

Waspinator:
Gender: Male 
Alliegence Predacon 
Alternate Mode(s): Robot/Wasp

Description:

"Waspinator have headache throughout his entire body"

Weapons: 
1) Hand Held energy gun that can also fire an explosive stinger 
(Robot Mode)

Beast Mode: 
Waspinator's beast mode is a wasp

History: 
Not much is known about waspinator other then that he is not too 
smart. His only main power is arial combat.

______________________________________________________________________
